WorkflowInfo.Name: Check for errors in a database table
WorkflowInfo.Description: Check for errors in a database table and send relevant rows to Admin
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:TSQLQuery;Assembly=TSQLQuery, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:Contains;Assembly=Contains, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetRows;Assembly=GetRows, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:TSQLQuery Password="123456" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" isUserAuthenticate="True" DisplayName="TSQL Query" IsValid="True" SiteId="0" ConnectionString="Data Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase;User Id=sql_user;Password=123456;" TypeName="TSQLQuery" Query="select * from hosts" SiteName="Default Site" EyeShareConnectionString="False" TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="tsqlQuery1" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="sql_user" Description="Preforms a database query on Microsoft SQL Server" ConnectionStringTextBox="Data Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase" /><ns1:Contains IsValid="True" x:Name="contains1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TheValue="%tsqlQuery1%" DisplayName="Contains" Description="Returns true if sting contains search phrase." TheValue2="Error" TypeName="Contains" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity2"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity3"><ns2:ReturnValue Value="True" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue3" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,True)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns3:GetRows RowNumber="" x:Name="getRows1" HostName="{x:Null}" RowContains="Error" ResultSet="%tsqlQuery1%" Timeout="00:01:00" IsValid="True" isRowNumber="1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Rows" ResultSetName="tsqlQuery1" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Gets specified rows from a resultset." HostId="0" TypeName="GetRows" /><ns4:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%getRows1%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" /><ns5:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Table lines containing Error are:" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16721"></HEAD>
<BODY><PRE><PRE>%convertToHTMLTable1%</PRE></PRE></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity4"><ns2:ReturnValue Value="False" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue4" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,False)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns6:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
